description.narrative: Rapid Response Mechanism (RRM), which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Emergency Preparedness Response-EWEA

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: In 2017, rapid assistance was provided to 228,145 displaced people and most vulnerable populations affected by crises in the Central African Republic through the RRM | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2018

title.narrative: Number of households that received NFIs items and WASH interventions

actual.value: 2015:43,888 households received NFI items and WASH interventions
